title: Growth model
brief_description: Presents views on limits to growth, including the availability of space, decreasing stores of natural resources and reduced effectiveness of social institutions. Also offers a scenario of the life of a young couple living in a growing society which lacks stabilising mechanisms.
description: Presents views on limits to growth, including the availability of space, decreasing stores of natural resources and reduced effectiveness of social institutions. Also offers a scenario of the life of a young couple living in a growing society which lacks stabilising mechanisms.
